data.actual_result: It does a slide animation before displaying the modal.
data.expected_result: It should just re-open Discord displaying the confirm modal without doing anything else.
data.short_description: A slide animation is made after minimizing/maximizing the app while the "Delete Server" confirm modal is opened
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server - Go to Server Settings > Overview > 3dots menu > Delete server. Do NOT confirm the modal yet.  - Minimize the app using the Home button of your Android device - Re-open the app using the Recent Tasks screen. Do NOT re-open it using the icon shortcut on your homescreen or else you will reproduce bug <>
